name: The Voice of the Rain [Book]
description:
The project consists of a limited run of books and prints to raise funds to build the Evisisi family a home. Jeremy Beasley lived with the family in Fiji for 3 weeks and documented their life.

Their generosity and kindness has inspired him to create this book and build the family a home from the sale of it. 

Over $16,000 has been raised so far. The goal is $30,000.

112 page, perfect bound book including stories and dozens of black and white film photographs. Soft cover.

All photographs in the book where made on Kodak Tri-x 400. 

Postage & Handling
Australia wide $15
International $28
